main_page.consumer_app_titlex: [(')十十十十一構ソチ‐ 2. Explore the Consumer Experience]
main_page.consumer_app_textx: [(')十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ See how an appliance owner benefits from connected services.]
main_page.consumer_app_title: [(')十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ 2. Remotely control your connected appliances]
main_page.consumer_app_text: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Use a mobile app to see how a consumer will experience the solution.]
main_page.simulate_appliance_subtitle: [(')十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Managing Simulated Appliances]
main_page.simulate_appliance_p1: [(')十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Create simulated appliances, send commands, and view responses right here.]
main_page.simulate_appliance_p2: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Use the web-based app in this starter offering to monitor live streaming data from your own appliances. Your appliances are connected automatically to the IBM Watson IoT Platform for you.  On the platform, you can see your appliances and the data and messages that they send.]
main_page.consumer_app_subtitle: [(')十十十一構ソチ‐ Exploring the Consumer Experience]
main_page.consumer_app_p1: [(')十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ The mobile app lets a consumer control and monitor a new washer using a mobile device. ]
main_page.consumer_app_p2: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Download the mobile app to an iOS phone to experience how consumers can send commands to their own washers via the platform.  ]
main_page.consumer_app_p3: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ You can use the simulated washer view to mimic failure events on the washer and then see the results in the consumer's mobile app.]
main_page.consumer_app_p4: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Appliance companies can offer these types of apps and services to attract and retain customers. They can also use the collected data to improve features of their products and offer new services.]

main_page.add_washer_message2: [(')十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ You have reached the limit of 5 washers.]
main_page.select_washer: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Select a washer to control its simulated data. A new window will open.]

main_page.must_add_washer: [(')十十十十十一構ソチ‐ You must add a washer before continuing with the mobile app experience.]
main_page.mobile_app_heading: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Get started with the mobile app on an iOS phone]
main_page.download_app_p1: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Download and install the app to your iOS phone from the Apple App Store (search for "ibm iot") ]
main_page.connect_app_p1: [(')十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Start the app on your phone.]
main_page.connect_app_p2: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Scan the connection QR code below when prompted to connect to the IoT for Electronics environment]
main_page.mobile_download_more_details: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ For detailed instructions, see the documentation.]
main_page.scan_heading: [(')十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ To connect the app to the environment, you'll be asked to scan this QR code]
main_page.scan_p1: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ The first time you use the mobile consumer app on your phone, you will scan this code to connect your mobile device to your IoT for Electronics Bluemix environment.]
main_page.scan_p2: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ You'll be asked to scan a different QR Code to register a washer on your mobile app with the platform. You will then go to the Add Washer section on this screen and click the washer being used. The window that opens displays the QR Code for the washer.]
main_page.manage_devices: [(')十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Now you can manage your appliances and other devices from the platform >]
main_page.device_deleted: [(')十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Success! Device {0} was successfully deleted.]
main_page.timeout_list: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ The request to list the devices has timed out, the simulation will restart. Please, refresh the page and try again.]
main_page.timeout_create: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ The request to create a device has timed out, the simulation will restart. Please, refresh the page and try again.]

contact_form.page_title: [(')十十一構ソチ‐ IoT for Electronics]
contact_form.header: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Partner with Watson IoT Lab Services to explore the potential of IoT within your industry and define and implement a successful IoT project.]
contact_form.section_p1: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ IBM Watsonâ„¢ Internet of Things (IoT) Lab Services is a group of professional engineers with expertise in creating IoT Industry Solutions and direct access to Watson IoT product and engineering teams. Our offerings provide value to your business by helping you accelerate adoption of IoT, increase your speed to market, and reduce barriers to adoption.]
contact_form.section_p2: [(')十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Start your IoT project with our exclusive Service Offerings.]
contact_form.checklist1_title: [(')十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ IoT for Electronics Discovery Workshop]
contact_form.checklist1_text: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Our IoT experts provide tested methodologies to help you discover the vast potential of IoT and define your first IoT project.]
contact_form.checklist2_title: [(')十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ IoT for Electronics Quick Win]
contact_form.checklist2_text: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ Our IoT experts help you create your own Minimum Viable Project (MVP) based on the priorities and goals that you defined in the Discovery Workshop. Your MVP demonstrates the value of IoT in your industry with organizational and departmental solutions.]
contact_form.section_p3: [(')十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十十一構ソチ‐ To get started, complete the following form. An IBM representative will contact you to discuss our offerings and your requirements.]
